definition: to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Adjustable hook-and-loop closure strap keeps shoes secure.
sentences.chinese: 可調的鉤環閉合揹帶保持鞋的安全。

sentences.english: Hook-and-loop closure for a customizable fit.
sentences.chinese: 一個可定製的適合的鉤環閉合。

sentences.english: Karibiner with the gate bent to accept the rope more easily. Not uncontroversial .
sentences.chinese: 鉤環的開口是彎的，使繩子可以比較容易掛入。
鉤環緊固件的可調式袖口。

sentences.english: Suspension gaiters with hook and loop boot hook.
sentences.chinese: 暫停與鉤環啓動鉤綁腿。

sentences.english: Hook-and-loop top strap keeps the foot locked down over the footbed.
sentences.chinese: 鉤環的頂級錶帶保持鎖定在鞋墊的腳。

sentences.english: Hook-and-loop closure for a secure and adjustable fit.
sentences.chinese: 安全和可調適合的鉤環閉合。

sentences.english: Features knit elastic with hook-and-loop closure for optimum fit.
sentences.chinese: 特色針織彈性鉤環的最佳契合封閉。

sentences.english: Hook-and-loop closure for easy on and off.
sentences.chinese: 鉤環閉合，方便開啓和關閉。

sentences.english: Adjustable strap with a hook-and-loop closure.
Using steel carabiners and non-"I-beam"-shaped carabiners is also a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 建議使用鋼質鉤環或者非工字型鉤環。

sentences.english: Using steel carabiners and non-"I-beam"-shaped carabiners is also a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 建議使用鋼質鉤環或者非工字型鉤環。

sentences.english: Lace closure with adjustable hook-and-loop midfoot strap for a secure fit.
sentences.chinese: 可調鉤環足弓一個安全合適的肩帶，花邊關閉。

sentences.english: Two hook-and-loop straps across the instep accommodate various instep heights.
sentences.chinese: 整個腳背的鉤環肩帶適應不同的腳背高度。

sentences.english: Genuine leather upper with decorative stitching three hook-and-loop straps for a custom fit.
sentences.chinese: 真皮鞋面裝飾拼接三個鉤環爲自定義適合的肩帶。
